author: scheu
msg: Don't write out xsi:nil="true" if PROP_SEND_XSI is false.

author: igors
msg: Added methods to retrieve DeployableItem for named handlers,
services and transports managed by the DeploymentRegistry.
This is necessary for dynamic reconfiguration of the processing

author: rubys
msg: Enable deserialization factories to know the desired java class in advance.
This can result in signficiant performance improvements as the
deserializers produced by this factory can be pre-initialized.
I also couldn't take it any more and split out BasicDeserializer into
Finally, I started an InternalException class along the lines of Glyn's
suggestion.  Among other things, it provides a place for convenient logging.
